participant_1.background:
I am afraid to tell my parents how I feel about my job because I know they will be disappointed.
i m pursuing my law degree.
I remember playing guitar with my friends in my basement for hours.
i drive a blue honda civic.
I've always been afraid of heights, but I overcame my fear when I went bungee jumping.

participant_2.background:
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
i have five children.
my doctor told me i have six months to live.
i drive a bmw.
I spend my days doing whatever I want, without a care in the world.

content.text: Hello, I'm doing well, thank you. How about you?
I'm doing alright, thank you. What do you do for work?
I am a teacher. I have five children of my own, and I love teaching.
Oh wow, that's a lot of kids! What do you teach?
I teach kindergarten. It's the best job in the world.
I'm sure it is! I've always been afraid of heights, but I overcame my fear when I went bungee jumping.
That's amazing! I'm not sure I could ever do that.
I know it's not for everyone, but I'm glad I did it.
Thank you. What do you like to do in your free time?
I spend a lot of time with my family, and I like to go swimming.
That sounds really nice. I like to play guitar.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
It's not too hard to learn. I started playing when I was in high school.
Maybe I'll look into taking some lessons.
